oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robert Flourney interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Robert Flourney served in Vietnam as a field artillery unit forward observer from September 1971 to July 1972. This interview was conducted September 17, 2020, at Burgess State Park by Billy Minser and Ed Caudill.
